name: Greatfather Winter
text:
His greatest gift of all is this card back. Just look at it!

Acquired by purchasing the Hero Greatfather Winter Magni.

name: Fortune's Favor
text:
May it bring you the luck of the draw!

Acquired by winning 5 games in ranked mode, February 2022.

name: Take the Cake
text:
But it's too beautiful to eat.

Acquired by winning 5 games in ranked mode, January 2022.

name: Frostwolf Fervor
text: When Alliance battles firmly persist, you always prove that the Horde will resist! Earnable on the Fractured in Alterac reward track.

name: Stormpike Spirit
text: No matter how many times the Horde drives you back, you won't let them triumph in Alterac! Earnable on the Fractured in Alterac reward track.

name: Celeste
text: She is living proof that the stars are smiling down on you. Earnable after purchasing the Fractured in Alterac Tavern Pass.
